heading: Architecture
description: Explorations of light, space, and time through material and structure.

items.heading: Barge Board Shotgun Renovation
items.copy: Breathing new life into an 1890s shotgun house made of barge boards.
items.label: View slideshow about the Barge Board Shotgun Renovation project

items.heading: House for an Art Collector
items.copy: Project Architect at Shafer Architects in Chicago for all construction phases.
items.label: View photos of the completed residence

items.heading: Vieux Carré Renovation
items.copy: Modernizing a very old house in the heart of New Orleans’ French Quarter.
items.label: View photos of the renovation

items.heading: Travel Sketches
items.copy: Documenting moments in architecture with pen and pencil.
items.label: View a baker’s dozen of sketches

items.heading: Travel Collages
items.copy: Storytelling in fragments via found and discarded objects.
items.label: View twelve collages

heading: Music
description: Some groups I’ve performed and recorded with on the drumkit alongside some song charts I’ve made.

items.heading: The Pietasters
items.copy: Co-founder of 8-piece ska band with a career spanning over 30 years.
items.label: Listen to the Piestomp album on Apple Music

items.heading: Thumpdaddy
items.copy: 5-piece Memphis-based party band with an energetic (and exhausting) 4-hour show.
items.label: Listen to the demo on Bandcamp

items.heading: SomNoSom
items.copy: Recording isolated drum, bass, and keyboard tracks across timezones.
items.label: Listen to the Stop Look Think track on Bandcamp

items.heading: Twelve Modern
items.copy: 5-piece Chicago-based experimental group with a violinist and two drummers.
items.label: Listen to the Like Ghosts album on Bandcamp

items.heading: Song Charts
items.copy: Transcriptions of fun/cool/tricky basslines and drum parts as played by masters of their craft.
items.label: View the bass and drums charts
